text: aur yadi tumhaaree patni yo (ke mahron) mein se kuchh tumhaare haath se nikal jae aur inakaar karanevaalon (adharmiyon) kee or rah jae, phir tumhaaree naubat aae, jo jin logon kee patniyon chalee gaee hai, unhen jitana unhonne kharch kiya ho de do. aur allaah ka dar rakho, jisapar tum eemaan rakhate ho
